title: Full Stack Developer
bulletpoints: Implemented a full front end Re-skin of the Prompty web application
Designed and Implemented a Data Fetching system for the Front-End of the application to unify how state is managed on the FE
Launched an event and attendee tracking system to be used with the physical Prompty business card product line

title: Developer Intern, Billing and Growth
bulletpoints: Worked on a squad that built and maintained a billing system that managed recurring charges, feature entitlement, and self serve customer activation and conversion
Developed AB tests and created analytics to evaluate new potential initiatives to drive engagement and activation
Spearheaded the creation of infrastructure to run large scale data migrations with the goal of updating pricing for older customers, leading to a large boost in ARR
